name: firefly
description: Server for filament in the browser

scripts.test: if [ "`uname`" = "Linux" ]; then npm_config_coverage=$npm_config_coverage runSlowSpecs=$runSlowSpecs npm run tests; else echo Running tests in VM; vagrant ssh login -c "cd /srv/firefly; npm_config_coverage=$npm_config_coverage runSlowSpecs=$runSlowSpecs npm run tests"; fi
scripts.start: vagrant up || (echo 'To run Aurora please install Vagrant from http://www.vagrantup.com/downloads.html' && exit 1)
scripts.stop: vagrant halt && echo 'Run `vagrant destroy` to completely remove the VMs (this will make `npm start` a lot slower)'
scripts.project-unmount-workspaces: npm run container-rm-all && vagrant ssh project -c 'sudo rm -rf /srv/workspaces && sudo start firefly-project'
scripts.container-logs: vagrant ssh project -c 'sudo su -c "docker ps -a -q | head -n 1 | xargs docker logs -f"'
scripts.container-files: vagrant ssh project -c 'sudo su -c "docker ps -a -q | head -n 1 | xargs docker diff"'
scripts.container-copy-files: vagrant ssh project -c 'rm -rf /tmp/workspace && sudo su -c "docker ps -a -q | head -n 1 | xargs -I {} docker cp {}:/home/montage/workspace /tmp" && cd /tmp/workspace && bash'
scripts.container-rebuild: npm run container-rm-all && deploy/vagrant/rebuild-container.sh && npm run deploy
scripts.login-debug: vagrant ssh login -c 'sudo pkill -USR1 -u montage -f "nodejs /srv/firefly" && node-inspector --web-port=8104'
scripts.project-debug: vagrant ssh project -c 'sudo pkill -USR1 -u montage -f "nodejs /srv/firefly" && node-inspector --web-port=8105'
scripts.project-clone: echo 'Removed, use `npm run container-files` or `npm run container-copy-files` instead'
scripts.update-dependencies: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm dedupe && git add --update node_modules && git add node_modules
